datadog_metric.name: Datadog Metrics
datadog_metric.description: Send a metric to Datadog (via DogStatsD)

metric.name: metric
metric.description: The name of the metric. Use periods (.) to delimit.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Optional map of strings to apply to the metric as tags.

user.title: Configure Datadog (DogStatsD)
user.description: Set up the host and port for your DogStatsD agent.

host.name: Host
host.description: Hostname or IP address of the DogStatsD agent. Leave as localhost if running the add-on agent.

port.name: Port
port.description: Port number where the DogStatsD agent is listening.

prefix.name: Metric Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix applied to all metric names (e.g., 'hass').
